property.name: title
property.value: UHN Patient Experience Inpatient Rehab Survey

property.name: text
property.value: Did you feel that there was good communication about your care between doctors, nurses, therapists and other hospital staff?

property.name: description
property.value: Examples of other hospital staff include: Dietitians, Personal Support Workers, Pharmacists, Physiotherapists, Occupational Therapists, Social Workers, Speech Language Pathologists, etc.

property.name: text
property.value: During this hospital stay, did you get all the information you needed about your condition and treatment?

property.name: text
property.value: Did you get the support you needed to help you with any anxieties, fears or worries you had during this hospital stay?

property.name: text
property.value: Were you involved as much as you wanted to be in decisions about your care and treatment?

property.name: text
property.value: Were you able to get a member of hospital staff to help you when you needed attention?

property.name: text
property.value: Before you left the hospital did you have a clear understanding about all of your prescribed medications, including those you were taking before your hospital stay?

property.name: text
property.value: Did you receive enough information from hospital staff about what to do if you were worried about your condition or treatment after you left the hospital?

property.name: text
property.value: Overall... (please answer on a scale where 0 is “I had a very poor experience” and 10 is “I had a very good experience”)

property.name: label
property.value: 0 - I had a very poor experience

property.name: label
property.value: 10 - I had a very good experience

property.name: text
property.value: Would you recommend this hospital to your friends and family?

property.name: text
property.value: What else would you like to say about this experience?

property.name: label
property.value: Additional questions about your recent stay at the hospital

property.name: text
property.value: Do you feel that you were treated with kindness and compassion?

property.name: text
property.value: Were you given enough information about what was going to happen during your stay at the hospital?

property.name: text
property.value: Were your caregiver(s) (family member or friend) involved as much as you wanted in decisions about your care and treatment?

property.name: text
property.value: During this hospital stay, did the care team invite you to participate in setting your rehab goals?

property.name: text
property.value: During this hospital stay, were you kept well informed about your progress in areas that were important to you?

property.name: text
property.value: During this hospital stay, did you learn what you needed to know in order to manage your care when you left the hospital?

property.name: text
property.value: During this hospital stay, were you given enough information about support services in the community (for example: nursing, home care, therapy)?

property.name: label
property.value: I did not require support services
